update.instructions: PHP code and language XML files can now easily be checked in many ways

added.item: Added breadcrumb text option to set it manually
Added javascript file to install for database form
Added theme support for overwriting plugin template files
Added Travis CI (travis.yml) again to show build status

reworked.item: Reworked database query logs so that they show bound data
Reworked languages plugin and added duplication and error detection
Reworked readme.md to contain much more information
Reworked theme and plugin template files

fixed.item: Fixed database install javascript file added by tom08
Fixed https detection and https-only login option

removed.item: Removed database order by random support from drivers
Removed service loader error logging and rethrow exception instead
Removed vendor prefixes in directory structure
